about_the_game:
Cyberpunk and traditional Chinese folklore collide in Fa Jin, an open-world, ARPG set in futuristic Shanghai - an advanced, but not so fortunate city.



Immerse yourself in the sprawling neon-lit streets of New Shanghai, a metropolis where ancient Chinese folklore collides with cyberpunk aesthetics. "Fa Jin" offers a vast open world teeming with secrets, hidden dangers, and breathtaking landscapes. From bustling marketplaces to dark alleyways, every corner of New Shanghai is meticulously crafted, providing a rich and immersive experience. Explore the vibrant districts, interact with diverse characters, and uncover the hidden lore that lies within the city and beyond.



Join forces with a diverse cast of characters in the Fa Jin Department, a dedicated folklore hunter unit tasked with eradicating the mythical threats plaguing New Shanghai. Each team member brings unique skills, backgrounds, and personalities, creating dynamic interactions and strategic depth. Form bonds, develop relationships, and work together to climb the Tower of Tian Yun. Whether it's a tech-savvy hacker, a battle-hardened warrior, or a mystic with ancient knowledge, your dream team will be crucial in overcoming the challenges ahead.



Prepare for an ever-changing adventure with roguelite elements that keep "Fa Jin" fresh and challenging. Each ascent of the Tower of Tian Yun offers a unique experience with procedurally generated levels, unpredictable folklore adversaries, and evolving strategies. As you progress, unlock powerful upgrades, cultivate your skills, and adapt to the tower's shifting environment. Death is not the end; with each attempt, you grow stronger, carrying forward the wisdom and abilities gained from previous runs. Can you conquer the tower, restore the lost memories, and unravel the mystery behind the folklore invasion?



In "Fa Jin," the Tower of Tian Yun stands as a beacon of memory and reincarnation, storing the collective memories of New Shanghai's populace. But when malevolent folklores breach its defenses, chaos ensues. Memories are lost, and the cycle of reincarnation is disrupted, plunging the city into turmoil. As a member of the Fa Jin Department, you are tasked with climbing the tower, battling the folklore invaders, and restoring the memories that hold the key to the city's survival. Delve into a world where technology and tradition intertwine, and embark on a journey that will test your resolve, strategy, and courage. The fate of New Shanghai rests in your hands.

name: Fa Jin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: Cyberpunk and Chinese folklore collide in Fa Jin, an open-world, ARPG set in futuristic Shanghai. Navigate the cityscape as you uncover plots that fester in the dark underbelly of the city. Will you thwart the plots that threaten the city, or become entangled in its web of deception?
